channel.title: Im lost! Cant put my server on public! please help me?!
channel.description:
I have 317 webclient, i dont know what is happening to my server, but i cant make it public, i did all steps i just want to make sure if i got all the steps? Only i can play on server from my own ip :(
1st step: get a no-ip or hamachi 2nd step: change the server ip on server.java to the no-ip i made
idk what else do i need to do for it to be public?? and also i dont need to port forward becuase im sing a modem! CAN SOMEBODY HELP ME PLEASE? ill be really happy!

item.title: Im lost! Cant put my server on public! please help me?!
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

You need a router to be able to portforward, OR your second option is U-torrent, it may be your only.

Read full topic

i’ve compiled and changed the clients ip to my own no-ip. i also only need to portforward only on my firewall becuase im not using a router but i already did that. idk but im really sad

item.title: Im lost! Cant put my server on public! please help me?!
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

Pk killerzz:

I did change 127.0.01 to the no-ip one i made, i also tried with hamachi but its still private to others ips, only i can play on my server, even from a client i made :(. damm i been on this for weeks

You’ve changed the client’s ip? and compiled? Also have you like unblocked the 43594 port or what ever port you are using from firewall etc?

run the server?

sounds like the client is connecting to 127.0.0.1 make sure you have configured it to your servers no-ip, i think its in like your client’s gui.java or maybe its client.java I cant remember.
